name: Auto-commit completed tasks
description: Automatically commits changes to git when a task is marked as complete
prompt:
A task has just been completed in the GeoCities AI project.

Task: {{task_name}}

Please:
1. Stage all changes related to this task using `git add .`
2. Create a commit with a descriptive message that includes the task name and what was accomplished
3. Use the format: "feat: [task number] - [brief description]"

Example: "feat: 3.1 - Implement city controller with in-memory storage"

Make sure the commit message is clear and follows conventional commit format.
